data.name: bootstrap_5_property_list_templates
data.description: Provides an alternative set of property list template files. Visit admin area Property Details Templates page for a list of alternatives you can use.
data.change_log: v1.1 Tweaked functionality to enable calling diff templates via url/shortcode. v1.2 Modified how box template looks in smaller layouts, modified  00005 script to ensure that we can send a setting to 01010 script to not show list properties header if required. v1.3 allow discovery of property list paths if task == "" v1.4 Documentation updated.
data.author: Vince Wooll
